title: Between Here and Heaven
description: Cari McKenna is struggling to deal with depression and grief after the unexpected death of her husband. Left to raise three young children Cari must find a way to rebuild their lives. After her husbandâ€™s spirit visits, encouraging her to move on, Cari toys with the idea of opening a coffee shop. With the support of friends and family Cari will find a way to show her children life does go on.
author: Lucinda Race
